name: Barb Roche
text: She was so through! Knowing the testing was uncomfortable, she kept telling me she was sorry for the pain I was in. She seems extremely knowledgeable in NCV and EMG testing. Very proficient Doctor.

name: Anner Johnson
text: Bonnie has the worst bed side matter and dont listen to the patient at all it really up set me to know she was talking about the other Doctors like they don't know what they're doing

name: Aprille Smalley
text: Excellent service, very concouncioinsious

name: Michelle Smith
text: This doctor gave my husband a strong narcotic without ever seeing him before and he took the entire prescription the same day. He has past drug problems and the Dr. New this. Rivers Carson Holliman should not ever be given any narcotics. The repercussions from his visit to your office will last a lifetime

name: Valerie MacIntyre
text: Excellent bedside manner!!!!!! Very friendly yet thorough. I would LOVE for him to remain my neurosurgeon!!!!! Absolutely the best Dr I have had.

name: Gregory Miller
text:
Lady at front desk was very nice and helpful
I lost my insurance card but she made it happen.ThankYou

name: Joby Joby
text: Good wait time ; very informative . Takes time to listen .

name: Dena Lawson
text: Dr. Poczatek made me feel totally at ease. He was professional with a sense of humor. He also explained the procedure, his findings, etc in good common sense language. I would definitely recommend him.

name: Michael Glasscock
text: I’ve used this practice and this doctor in the past. The entire experience was exceptional from the entire staff. Highly recommend.

name: Gail Kellum
text: Dr. Poczatek was very knowledgeable, caring and personable.  He performed nerve conduction and EMG testing on me.  The testing was a breeze and over quickly.  I definitely will go back to him and recommend to  anyone who made need testing.  Office staff are also very pleasant and helpful...

name: Randy K Curtis
text: Everybody I encountered was friendly and knew their jobs very well and Dr Poczatec was very professional. If I ever need these services again I will without a doubt schedule here.

name: Myron Piziak
text: One should not have to wait 1 hour an 15 minutes in the waiting room and another 20 minutes in the exam room and have to accept, sorry for the delay.

name: Jan Jordan
text: July 10th was my first visit with Dr. Poczatek. I wasn’t really sure what to expect. Upon meeting him, I was impressed that he had already seen a copy of my MRI, even though I brought a copy for him to evaluate. So having seen it before our visit, I feel he was prepared. (I have been to doctors who are reading info about my symptoms for the first time as they are sitting in front of me.)

name: Peggie Murphree
text: Dr. Poczatek is a terrific doctor... very caring and takes time to explain your care thoroughly.

name: Vanessa Mitchell
text: I love Dr Poczatek. He was so professional, and really , really cares for me and my condition . I was disappointed about having to pay a co payment each time I mean I.

name: Lynn Duvall
text: I spent about 7 minutes explaining the problems I had been having following KNEE replacement surgery. He listened without making notes or asking questions then said, “I’ll be right back.” He did not come back. Instead, a nurse came in and handed me a prescription for physical therapy for BACK pain.

name: Marilyn Bryars
text: A visit with Dr P. always makes me feel better. He is such a learned professional & always seems to know just what to do to help. Additionally he is one of the most pleasant & kind Doctors I have ever been to.

name: Karin Callahan
text: I like that he has reviewed my file before he  enters the exam room, comes in, sits down, and then actually listens to me. I find that rare in a physician. Most are making notes and not looking at you.

name: Barbara Brown
text: Long wait.  Called next day to check on test ordered and nothing had been done.

name: Chaunette Snow
text: His personality was great! Dr. Poczatek showed compassion for me and my condition. My first impression of him was very pleasing. I look forward to being his patient.

name: Melissa Twigg Talks
text: This man was comfortable, confident, relaxed, and actually LISTENED to me as I explained I wanted non-pharmaceutical answers to a 2 + yr back problem if at all possible.  I highly recommend him! I come from a smaller town and this experience was a different and impressive world. Thx to you Dr P! Continued success!

name: ThumperDelta Resistance
text: Dr P. is awesome. Had a historically bad test go fantastically well with him today. He has a great bedside manner about him. He managed to keep my mind off of the the bad elements of the test. I wish I had seen him 15 years ago. Could have saved me alot of pain. Can't say enough good about this Dr.

name: Chanel DJ Keitges
text: Couldn't ask for a better doctor. He has great bed side manner's. He took time to explain my treatment plan. Great doctor.

name: Donna Hearn
text: Dr. Poczatek is wonderful. He explains things very  thoroughly   And has a lovely sense of humor.  Dr. Poczatek Administered a nerve  conductance study  on me.  I was very nervous, and my whole body is in a lot of pain  to begin with and his bedside manner helped me as we proceeded with the test.    I highly recommend him.

name: SUSAN REGINA PERRIN
text: Dr. Poczate was very nice and friendly.  He performed my nerve test careful and with minimal discomfort.  He was very personable and informative.

name: teresa boutwell
text: Wonderful Doctor. Kept me distracted by having a wonderful conversation while he did my procedure. I recommend him highly!!

name: Carol Huntley
text: Made me feel he really cared   about my medical issue I was there for

name: Pat Works
text: I was very pleased to meet Dr. Poczatek and liked him right away.  He was friendly, listened to what I said and/or described, asked questions; we discussed the x-ray and MRI and he assured me we would get to the bottom of why I am having the pain issues I have.  My husband and I came away feeling very positive about Dr. Poczaek.

name: JLR A
text: Not too long a wait time, very personable & friendly staff as well as Dr. P! Made the nerve conduction study easier by talking to me about this and that thru the entire thing.. not too bad! He explained everything in detail and made me feel very comfortable! His assistant was awesome, too!

name: Melanie Taylor - Coleman
text: Dr Poczatek  is a very pleasant doctor. He chatted with me about random things when he conducted my nerve study. It made the nerve study go by quickly. He talked with me after the test and discussed the findings. He is a great guy as well as knowledgeable. The only reason I did not give him 4 stars is due to him being late. I was the first patient and still waited almost a hour.

name: Ashley Mitchell
text: Active listener who truly wants to get to know his patients. Empathetic and sincere, with the patient's quality of life at the heart of every decision he makes about their treatment.

name: Michael Poritz
text: Dr. Poczatek is the most personable, professional, proficient and all around versatile physician I have had the pleasure of dealing with in years. He is highly educated with several degrees and has had many diverse life experiences that have broadend his listening and discerning capabilities greatly. His communicative skills are superb on all levels. He is also blessed with a staff of equally talented and congenial personnel. I am looking foward to being under his treatment.

name: Tina M Hall
text: He has wonderful personality very nice and funny. Made me feel relaxed would definitely see him again

name: Nancy Picogna
text: I had a great experience at Neurosurgical Associates today. I had heard horrible things about this procedure and dreaded it. I'm not saying it was fun but Dr Poczatek was very kind and personable and pleasant. It made the procedure much more bearable! 😊 I would definitely recommend them to others and already have!

name: Amanda Gilley
text: Had a nerve conduction study done on my legs and feet. Dr. Poczatek has a wonderful personality and a great staff to support him. I would recommend him to anyone needing his services.

name: Larry Houck
text: Dr. Robert Poczatek is a first rate Neurological physician. He is highly knowledgeable in his area of medicine. The staff is very helpful and the offices are very modern and spotless.

name: Venia McMorris
text:
Super friendly Doctor, talks to you about the
Procedure as he is preforming it. The only downside was the wait time

name: Meggan Talley
text: Great Doctor, he got right to problem and gave me options. I finally feel like I am getting somewhere! Thank you!

name: Dianne Scavarda
text: Just wish he was in Cullman more than just once a week.

name: Glenda Calhoun
text: Dr. Proczatek is an excellent doctor!  He was professional and knowledgeable, yet very friendly.  More importantly, I am happy he diagnosed the area of my nerve pain!

name: holli moss
text: Dr. P. was wonderful! He was very patient and took time to thoroughly** answer all questions, despite the late hour.  He was friendly, kind, and encouraging. Dr. P. is your guy.

name: Lori Hunt
text: Informative,, professional, and great bedside manner. I felt hopeful after seeing this Doctor.. His kind knowledgeable manner made me feel very at ease.

name: Denell Grissom
text:
Great guy. Listened to me and walked me me thru the procedure. Dr. P was very detailed oriented and made the procedure as painless as possible.
Thanks Dr. P!

name: Jeannine Carmichael
text: Dr. Poctazek was very attentive to my recent physical complaint. I recommend him highly.

name: Pamela Seevers
text: Was very pleasant ,a nice man , got straight to the point and explained what he believes is going on , why ,,and what is needed to help me &..I appreciate all of that .. Thank you Dr Poczatek

name: Maggie Postell
text: Dr P is awesome!! Great bedside manner and very informative! Will definitely use him again

name: Lamar Smith
text: Dr Poczatek was great. Took his time to explain everything about my situation 👌

name: Rebecca Davis
text: Dr. Poczatek was very knowledgeable and professional. It was easy to discuss my medical issues with him.

name: Cecelia Woods
text: I was most greatful for the kindness of Dr. Poczatek, such sweet bedside manners made me feel so comfortable. All the things I love about a doctor's office, I received today. Thanks.

name: G Caddell
text: I have been a patient of Dr P's for over a year. I would give him 6 stars if I could. He is thorough, experienced, professional and empathetic.

name: Selina Miller
text: Dr. Poczatek is a wonderful Dr. He has a great bedside manner and answered all the questions I had! Very personable!

name: Wayne Taylor
text: Have to say this was the most comfortable doctor visit I've ever had.

name: libby sterling
text: Dr Poczatek is a excellent dr. I have received the best of care at St. Vincents.

name: Mr. Officer
text: An excellent physician that takes the time to listen and shows genuine concern. He took several visits with Dr. Poczatek came up with a plan just for me and found a solution to my problem.

name: Brynn Wilson
text: Listen well, understood I was breastfeeding and tried to help find the right medication/plan of care to continue that journey.

name: Yvonne A. White
text: Very nice and professional.

name: Nia
text: Exceptional on every level.

name: Chad Alexander
text: Very informative.

name: Regina Posey
text: It's always a great experience whenever I have an appointment @ Ala Ortho Spine and Sports.  I'm seen in a reasonable amount of time and not forced to sit all day. The Doctors are very pleasant and seems concerned about their patients well-being.

name: David Leemon
text: I have been seeing Dr. Goodman for several years. He keeps my body going so I can function and keeps me able to ride my Harley-Davidson. His staff is awesome!!

name: L. Rowe
text: I appreciate the patience and details provided by Dr. Goodman and Dr. Hendrix.

name: Diane H
text: Dr Goodman has quite the personality.  Hes patient understanding and genuinely concerned about his patients. He makes you feel heard as well as comfortable asking my questions and concerns!

name: Darlene Jones
text: From the moment I walked into their facility,  I felt nothing but compassion & kindness. The staff & Dr. Goodman gave me awesome love & thoroughness.

name: delores knight
text:
I had a great experience here.
The staff was friendly, yet professional,  and the Doctors were kind and attentive to my needs.

name: Chris Dove
text: The whole staff was a very professional,  but down to earth staff! I was nervous about my procedure but they made everything very pleasant!  Shout out to Jennifer!!

name: Amanda Morrow
text: The nurses are so nice and listen to you. Dr. Goodman is so understanding of the way you try to explain your concerns and how spinal pain is affected you. He is a compassionate man and a wonderful doctor.

name: Ronnie Lyle
text: Dr. Goodman is the BEST. He tells you how it is, explains your options and treatment. He has been spot on for my back and knee problems, and the care that he gives. Everyone at the practice is awesome.

name: Wendy Nesbitt
text: Friendly environment,courteous staff, did not have to wait long at all. Just love Dr. Goodman.

name: Meleia Chappell
text: I have had three spinal nerve blocks in the last 14 years for my injured back. Dr. Goodman has administered all of them. He is absolutely worth the 1 hour drive. He is very professional and has excellent bedside manners.  He is a great listener and excellent at providing me with care for my back issues. His staff is also wonderful. I will continue to see him anytime I have a need. I without hesitation,  recommend him to anyone seeking answers! Thank you Dr. Goodman!

name: Adrienne Sharpe
text: Dr. Goodman was very professional so caring!! He can in to check on me before the surgery!! He was on time and on point on all cylinders!! I will always request him and his staff was amazing!! They even made jokes to make me feel comfortable!!

name: Bill Brooks
text: Always got great treatment. Doctors and personal are always courteous and friendly. These people really treat you well and always have your care as top priority!!!

name: Michelle Urban
text: Very pleased with Dr  Goodman. Staff were all very friendly and professional.

name: Jane Grace
text: Dr. Goodman is an excellent doctor. He is caring, listens and knows how to get the job done.

name: Rich Patsios
text: I was pleased with my experience. I had a pain situation and was able to see Dr. Goodman the very next day. I like the electronic sign in kiosks, and my interaction with the staff members met or exceeded my expectations. Dr. Goodman noticed some pain Med limitations that one of my other doctors had posted in my general record. I’m quite impressed.

name: Gwendolyn Caver
text:
I just want to say that Dr. Goodman and his staff and Nurses were the best. My experience was very uplifting and positive.
It made me feel good and confident about the procedure.  Last but not least Dr. Goodman is a singing Dr. Y'all, he sang to me before he started and I just loved it. It made me laugh so hard and took my mind off the procedure.
Love to all involved.   Gwendolyn Caver

name: Bruce Dunnagan
text: My experience here from the time I signed in to the time I spoke with Dr Goodman was absolutely amazing. My primary Dr failed to send the MRI images but Dr Goodman was able to diagnose me just by my symptoms. After his diagnosis he handed him the MRI report and it was almost word for word what the report stated! Amazing facility and staff!

name: Tammy Edwards
text:
Dr. Goodman & his staff make you feel at ease from start to finish.
They work hard as a team to make sure all of your needs are met while also being down to earth and able to explain every detail.
I have and will continue to refer friends & family.

name: Belinda Tribble
text: First time @ this location. Everyone was attentive, nice and made me feel safe. At times like we’re in now, it’s hard going thru procedures/ surgery anything alone. Thanks to all the staff and Dr. Goodman

name: Lilia Brown
text: Very good communication with me, I understood what my problem is and how he was going to treat it. Have a follow up appointment after MRI. Satisfied.

name: Brenda Foster
text: THE RECEPTION AND STAFF WAS EXCELLENT  DR GOODMAN CALL ME MY FIRST NAME LIKE HE HAD KNEW ALL MY LIFE HE MAKED ALL THE ARRANGMENT FOR MY PROCEDURE

name: Martha Tucker
text: Dr. Goodman has been taking care of my orthopedic needs for years. He and his staff are the best. Prompt, caring,  courteous and professional.

name: Lynn Ingram
text: The staff is courteous. Get in to see physician fast. He's personable.

name: leanne winslow
text: Fantastic Dr, really listens to you

name: Jeannie Reed
text: Everytime I went for an appointment I waited for over an hour. He spends maybe 2 minutes with you before walking out the door. I called him Mr. Mcoomer. He corrected me told me it Dr. Mc Mcoomer. He is extremely unprofessional and would never schedule an another appointment with him even if he was the last doctor on the plant.

name: John Montero
text: This office took advantage of my Senior Citizen Father(80 years old). He went to this office a while back for leg pain. My Father is on a fixed income and cannot afford anything extra. They gave my Dad a Knee Brace. My Dads insurance was billed about $3000.00 for the brace. The Insurance paid for all but about $400.00. You can by the exact brace at Walmart for $30.00. My Dad never used the brace. He did not even take it out of the package. The Doctor refused to take it back. This office continued to send threatening letters about the brace. The case is still under review by the insurance company. This Doctors Office put a negative account on MY CREDIT REPORT. My Father and I have the same name but we don't have the same social security number. I don't understand how they got this on my credit report. I HAVE NEVER BEEN TO THIS PLACE IN MY LIFE!!!! I disputed this account with Experian and this Doctors Office sent it back to the credit bureau as correct. Now I have to hire an Attorney to go after these guys to get this erroneous account off of my credit. NEEDLESS TO SAY, I WILL NEVER GO TO THIS PLACE. THEY ARE BAD!!!

name: Jackson Smith
text: Dr. McCoomer and his staff are simply amazing. He goes above and beyond to treat chronic pain. I have been to several doctors in the area who treat you as a number. He brought my quality of life back and I am able to do things I enjoy. Melissa is outstanding and always has a pleasant personality. I will NEVER go anywhere else for my pain management. BEST PRACTICE AROUND!

name: Mary L
text: Dr. McCoomer, Melissa, and all of the staff are wonderful. Dr. McCoomer goes above and beyond to take care of his patients and provide a better quality of life. The injections that he does have helped my pain tremendously. The patients with negative feedback obviously did not want to feel better and just wanted medication. If you see this doc, do not let any of the negative feedback make you believe you are not doing a good job. Clearly, the negative comments are previous patients who did not get what they wanted. You and your staff are stellar! The ABSOLUTE BEST around and I am so truly thankful for you! My quality of life has changed significantly for the better. Thank you!

name: Howard Goan
text: Dr McCoomer and his Great Staff has made life tolerable again , been with him for years now, through injections and medication I am enjoying life again

name: Shari & Gary Knutzen
text: Dr. MCcoomer is the worst pain Dr. I have ever been to. Could not and would not get my pain under control. He Evidently mistaken me  for another patient when he gave me a pain block shot for my hips when I never in my life had any hip problems. But now I do after the shot. Everyone in this office is phony. The Elevators have never been cleaned as I had gotten sick on Elevators 6 months ago and  vomit is still on the walls of elevator. I ask for discharge letter and have called three different times and left messages and have been ignored. I cannot see another pain dr. Until I get a positive discharge letter of being clean with my drug test that they gave me for the 6 months I was with this dr. Before I fired him due to being a very poor and neglected to own up to mistaken and treat me as a wrong patient. I will be seeking legal help from an attorney for malpractice. If I do not get a response from his office. So patience please beware of tis pain management dr.

name: P. W.
text: Went to see Dr. McCoomer for a herniated disc.  He and his staff got me back to normal in a quick amount of time.  Could not have been more happy with him and his staff, and the medical treatment I received.

name: Patricia Mabe
text: Very nice and clean friendly staff and dr takes time with each patient and understands how people feel

name: Mrs. Blocker
text:
This office takes advantage of veterans and are completely unprofessional. Horrible attitudes in this office. Tried to reschedule my appointment but they insist that I never called or left a voicemail and gave me the runaround for almost two months. Was then told that I could not be seen until this "fee" is paid.

They left me waiting for over an hour past my appointment and then told me they could no longer see me that day.

Losing a patient over a scam of a $100 fee for missing an appointment is everything you need to know about this place. I hope it was worth it for them.

name: Cathy Wallace
text: So bad ....rude....took two months to get results ... Let it set so long couldn't  get results from it....then after all that contacting me was sooooo uncalled-for!!!!!!!!

name: penny buckelew
text: Before I met Dr. McCoomer and his team, I was not able to function in my daily life and was in severe pain. I was not able to play with my baby or enjoy anything. Once I received treatment from him, I can now get in the floor and actually play and enjoy my baby. I can do things that I was never able to do before. I can now work a full time job because of him . Dr. McCoomer and his staff are amazing and so nice . They actually listen to you and know your pain is real. Because of Dr. McCoomer and his staff I can have a life again and I am so grateful!

name: Martha Roden
text: Dr McCoomer has helped me in so many ways. He has worked on my pain and  my mental stress. I’m a different person. I’m about 80% better because of him. If you want a caring and professional doctor please see Dr. McCoomer.

name: Captain Jim (cptnjimusa)
text: Dr, McComer and his staff have been great to me.. He is by far the best pain Doctor I have seen and have seen them in my former hometown of Mobile and here in Huntsville.  His staff is friendly  and answer my questions and help with any problems.  I will give him a 5 star but compared to most pain doctors he would be a 10 star and most I have seen were a 1 at best.

name: Jessica Franks
text: I went for years not knowing what I was actually being treated for. Dr. McCoomer is the very first Dr to give me a diagnosis and a treatment plan that worked. Him and his staff are all wonderful! I'm blessed to have been referred to him. Thank you all at Pain and Rehabilitation consultants!

name: Jon Hamlin
text: Always available to discuss any concerns or ussues. Pleasant staff. Appointment times are rarely missed by much. Supportive and professional service.

name: Jim Eastman
text: Dr. McCoomer is amazing.   He is an outstanding Dr. who listens to you and doesn't just treat you like a number.  I have seen Dr. McCoomer monthly since September 2015.  He has provided so much pain relief for many issues.   His knowledge of pain related issues is far above any other pain management Dr. I have been a patient of.  I have been treated by non-invasive as well as invasive procedures under his direct care and I can honestly say if I hadn't found his practice I would still be completely miserable with intolerable pain.  If you are looking for a pain management Dr., I cannot recommend his practice enough.  His staff is extremely friendly and personable.  They always know who i am every time i walk through the door and greet me immediately by name.  Thank Heavens for finding him and his practice!

name: Tim F
text:
Dr. McCoomer and his staff are patient focused and professional.  I hope you never need a pain and rehab consultant, but if you do, I highly recommend him.

Compared to other pain consultants in the Huntsville area, they are “head and shoulders” above the rest.  Thanks Dr. McCoomer!!

name: Pamela DeFoor
text: I have never been to a doctor who had my best interest like Dr McCoomer, he listened to me and he did tests that no other doctors have ever done and he has helped me tremendously. I thank God for a man who has dedicated his time to make sure his patients have the best care. He is truly one of God's chosen.  I have never felt better and the direct approach to what was causing my pain and discomfort he is the only doctor who has ever put me under an xray machine to inject the very location of the problem causing me pain. I know that God has blessed him and his family. He is awesome and his staff are the best. Thank you God for allowing me to find him. He did MRI,s and test that after 20 years of pain, I am now properly taken care of. Thank you for being so thorough in finding my problems. I am so happy to be with a doctor who is really worried about what is causing the pain and he does everything to give you relief with the newest medical technology . Thank you so much for all of your knowledge of how to treat the problem and not cover it up with unnecessary medication. You are truly blessed!!

name: Jean Davis
text: I have been very pleased with the service that I have received, friendly staff and a caring doctor, and clean environment!

name: Heath
text: Dr. McCoomer takes time to listen to you and to really help you. He has done everything to help with my quality of life. Truly a great doctor and staff!

name: James Bounds
text:
I'm very pleased with my decision to go to Dr. McCoomer after my accident. I feel that after his assistance with rehabilitation, education, and medicine I've been able to get some quality of life back.

Thank you Dr. McCoomer.

name: Michele Young
text: He is a very good DR. he knew where to go on my back and hit it right on the mark. That was the first dr. that has done that. I am sorry he moved from the Alabama Pain  Center. Hoping to get in to see him...

name: Kayla Ashford
text: I am so glad I was referred to Dr. McCoomer. He actually cares and takes the time to listen to his patients. After years of battling Fibromyalgia pain, I am finally feeling better than I have in a very long time. Thank you so much Dr. McCoomer for improving my quality of life.

name: Shawn Nichols
text: I have been suffering with chronic back pain since 1997. I was injured in a horrific car wreck,  I have been to more rehabilitation institutes than most.  Dr McCoomer has helped me the most so I can have somewhat of a life. He listens to me and truly understands my pain and is a super Dr. Knowing I have a great Dr takes a lot of the frustration out of my mind so I can focus on getting better. If anyone has to live with serious back pain...Dr McCoomer is the one that will honestly get you back on track toward a better way of life.

name: Bob Bohn
text:
I never got to meet the doctor.  The administrative staff is so poor that after waiting over 45 minutes past my appointment they wanted to reschedule one month out!
They also attempt to push a $100 fee for missing an appointment but apparently that doesn't apply to them.
The only time I saw Dr. Mccoomer was when he took the effort to tell a patient in pain to take her foot of his furniture.
Not a good first impression and I won't allow a second.

resp.text: I am sorry that you feel this way. We pride ourselves on excellent and quality patient care, as well as, office appearance. We also strive to minimize disruption in our clinic at all times for all of our patients. Unfortunately, you were not pleased with our office or our staff and if you would like to discuss your problems please contact our office. Thank you.

name: Jimmy Creech
text: Answered my questions quickly and professionally

name: Matthew Halbrook
text: Dr.mCcoomer I was a patient of yours at the Alabama pain clinic that place is a nightmare now. I want to come to your new office I just hope u remember me. I hope u can take me as a patient again I cannot take it anymore at the Alabama pain clinic. I really hope(need to) see you soon.

name: Jan Ikard
text: Excellent Dr. & Staff!!!  Dr.McCoomer takes time to sit & talk w/you and he really cares how your doing!!!

name: Chris Sharpe
text: Dr. McCoomer treats people individually. He provides a wide range of techniques and supports physical therapy and other patient participation in their pain management.

name: Misty Pierce
text: Great Doctor and great bedside manners.

name: Marcia Sharpe
text: Very nice doctor and staff.

name: Joyce Richardson
text: The best pain doctor I have ever had.

name: Jim Chapman
text: Dr. Mellempati is very knowledgeable and professional and has a wonderful personality the kind of person that makes you feel better just walking into the room. He performed a nerve block on me two years ago that allowed me to keep my Alaska cruise. I’m looking forward to seeing him again. You won’t be disappointed having him as your doctor.

name: Jimmy Odom
text: Everyone that helped me before and after my procedure on 6/16/2021 were very polite helpful very professional. With 10 being the best they get an 11

name: Angela Freeman
text: The staff from the beginning of check in at the registration desk all the way to being pushed out in a wheelchair to my car was absolutely 100% satisfaction. The Drs & staff at Grandview are so sweet, caring & definitely funny as well. Not one person made my time there uncomfortable & for that I'm truly grateful. Grandview is a wonderful hospital, with amazing staff & excellent Drs. Dr Mallempati was my Dr that treated me & He is so nice & so good at going over every single step he will take for your procedure. I thank the Dr & ALL the staff for an excellent feel of  care,, love & respect while in their care. 🙏♥️

name: Shirley Worthington
text: Dr. Mallempati is an excellent diagnosticion.  This is my second time to come back to him during the past 5 years.  He is patient, kind and identifies problem and options quickly.  I trust his knowledge and skills and would recommend him most highly.

name: Brittany Tucker
text: Dr, Mallempatti worked me in last minute as a new patient due to a back injury . He was very compassionate and got me a treatment plan fast. His staff provided excellent customer service . I was very pleased with my experience even though it was a painful one .

name: Rose Davis
text: The staff absolutely friendly respectful and very caring which made me more comfortable the experience was amazing

name: Sissy Emerson
text: When I  come to Dr. Mallempati's office I  receive knowledgeable and compassionate care. Dr Mallempati has been my Dr. for several years. Because of him my pain level has significantly decreased and I can enjoy life. I highly recommend him to anyone in oain.

name: Sara Ellis
text: When I had issues with the staff Dr. Mallempati was quick to call and address the issues and I really appreciate that.

resp.text:
Hello, Sara. Excellent patient service is very important to us and something we continually strive to achieve. If you are willing, we would like the opportunity to learn more about your experience. Please use the URL listed below to provide us your contact information directly. Thank you.
Contact URL: https://tinyurl.com/yjct7kvm

name: Joycelyn Smith
text: Everyone was so professional and Dr. Mallempati is a extraordinary doctor.

name: Jessica Lacey-Golden
text:
Of all the doctors I've seen from cardiologist, neuro, ortho,ED and so forth he has had the BEST bedside manor. He is thorough, caring and wants to get to the point with no talking about it but actually doing it. Now the enternest on the other hand has a lot to learn. He asked me the same questions over and over. This is honesty. He asked me my age 3 times and how I broke my tailbone 3 times and what dr ordered my coccyx MRI when all I had already told him 2-4 times there was no MRI of the coccyx only an x-ray.  So he needs to get a little more memory because if not the medical field isn't for him.

But with all that being said Dr. MELLEMPATI IS THE BEST AND I WILL REFER EVERYONE TO HIM. I LOVE THE BEDSIDE MANOR AND THOROUGHNESS. HE NEEDS TO TEACH CLASSES TO THE OTHER DOCTORS. HAHA THANKS FOR A GREAT EXPERIENCE

name: Jennie Bunton
text: I had a very pleasant experience today. Everyone was so nice. I appreciate that. I'm so happy I can already bend over to feed my dog. Dr. Mallempati is a very kind and compassionate man.

name: Jackie Hill
text: My experience with the Staff & Doctors was amazing. Everyone was great they took care of all my needs making me feel like I was in the Best of care. You guys are the BEST...

name: Nikki Harvey
text: Dr. Mallempati and his staff are excellent. He is very attentive and takes the time listen to you. I am very happy with his practice.

name: Patrick Bailey
text: Dr. Mallempati is the only back pain doctor that has been able to help me with my back pain. Always nice. Listens and lets you explain your problem. Tries to find the best option for you.

name: Chip Brush
text: Dr Mallempati and his staff at rhe Hoover office were fast, flexible and effective. I was very much appreciative of their ability to see my wife and I virtually at rhe same time, for similar issues. Greatly helped to streamline getting us done with xrays and injections in record time! Very tight team!

name: Belinda Blackshear
text: My first time experience was very pleasant and respectful,  the staff was great, and made sure that my every need was taken care of,  and I truly loved that,  and appreciated it,  thanks to Dr. Mallempati,  and all his colleagues and the great, great RN'S, who looked after me, well done 😁🙏❤🤘

name: LAVSHA KING
text: The Doctor is the truth!! He and his staff made sure I was well taking care of. He check on me before the surgery and made sure all of my questions was answered.  Thank you Dr. Mallempati and your team!!!

name: John McDonald
text: He understood what was going on and he answered every question that I had. I will be going for a procedure next Thursday

name: LAVSHA KING
text: The Doctor is the truth!! He and his staff made sure I was well taking care of. He check on me before the surgery and made sure all of my questions was answered.  Thank you Dr. Mallempati and your team!!!

name: Karen Millwee
text: Dr Mallimpoti is a very caring doctor I have been seeing him for a long time he shows he cares and his staff in the office and the nurses and the whole staff is wonderful makes a bad experience  with pain alittle more pleasant thank you all

name: Mary Denson
text: Everyone was very caring, they took very good care of me and Dr. Mallempati is THE BEST!!!!!!

name: James Smith
text: Great experience

name: Charlotte Pruett
text: Although there was no nerve damage detected  I am still having an issue with my arm tingling  and burning from the bend of my arm to the base of my thumb

name: Wayne Benton
text:
If you ever have a chance for this Doctor To be Your Doctor,  Do not miss that opportunity.
He is very highly skilled and with the wisdom and compassion all Great Doctors have. He is also a very good man, Son, Husband and Father.. Solid , respected, and thoughtful.

name: Leandro Barbato
text: Very good doctor 👏👏👏👏👏

name: Wanda McKoy
text: Absolutely the best (and caring). No exceptions!

name: Sharon Barker
text: He is an awesome, respectful doctor, and his staff is amazing as well. I would recommend him to anyone having spinal problems.

name: Elizabeth Houston
text: No meds so how do i survive since surgrey is not needed as of yet ?

name: Martha Fowler
text: Had a pinched sciatic nerve major pain. He helped me tremendously and always treated me with great concern. Always refer folks to him. To me none better than Him.

name: Bill Reese
text: Treated my wife with dignity and kindness.  Evaluated her and made a plan to help her.  Didn't push pills or outside services.

name: mark smith
text: Dr. Mallempati is the very best, most caring, Dr. In this business. I have suffered from bulging disc, and sciatica pain for years and had shots from many different Dr.s. I recommend Dr. Mallempati as the very best you will find on Alabama.

name: Deborah Tarver
text: I have had fusions, back surgerys, 19 in all from 1996 until now 2017 had several blocks over the years unsuccessful at that until April of this year. I was so shocked at the results of Dr Mallempatis work on my back it was like a miracle for me. I had almost lost hope on getting any relief, but he really is the greatest. Thank you Dr.Mallempati

name: Mary Williford
text: Dr Mallempati was awesome!!!

name: ella mccarver
text: Dr. Mallempati is extremely compassionate and accessible to his patients. We have achieved excellent results so far in controlling the pain of sciatica and spondilolithesis .

name: Finderia Brown
text: Dr .Mallempati's very good Dr I visit him this year and was please but the procedure I had done didn't help to what's going on with my knee but very professional and caring Dr thanks Dr Mallempati's

name: Jeff Langner
text: Great for epidural block

name: Tom Thompson
text: My wife had a referral there. It has been 3 days and they still have not called back.

name: Tabitha Corr
text: I had a wonderful experience this morning with Dr.Zywicke, her nurse Jarena, and her CRNP Amelia. I had a little bit of a wait but considering they make rounds at the hospital because they are surgeons was to be expected and totally understandable. They both listened to me and checked me out thoroughly. They explained what was going on with me and answered all my questions. I felt like I was their only patient while they were in my room. I am confident when she takes me to the operating room that I couldn't be in better hands. I highly recommend Dr.Zywicke.  she is very nice and she listens to what you have to say!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Corr. Thank you very much for the 5-star review! We're so glad to read your impressions of Dr. Zywicke and her team and can't wait to share your comments with them. Thank you for trusting your surgery to Huntsville Hospital Spine & Neuro Center. We truly appreciate your support.

name: JJ Parsons
text: Staff here is ALWAYS great. Friendly and well informed on individual cases and I always get top notch care when I'm there. Waiting room currently closed but they do have areas set up with social distancing in mind inside or you can wait in your call and they will call you.

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Parsons. Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your experience at Huntsville Hospital Spine & Neuro Center. We appreciate your support as well as your patience with our social distancing protocols.

name: robbie johnson
text: Just returned home from having ACDF surgery by Dr. Jason Banks. First I want to thank Dr. Banks and his staff at the Spine@Neuro office for their professional and friendly help. Next I want to thank the staff at Huntsville Hospital pre-op , surgery and recovery for the care I received there. Its a shame that you cannot receive the same care at our local hospital North Alabama Medical Center.

resp.text: Hello, and thank you so much for taking the time to let others know about your experience with Dr. Banks, Spine & Neuro staff and Huntsville Hospital! We're so pleased to hear your impressions of our surgical services and will make sure Dr. Banks sees this. Thank you for choosing us for your procedure.

name: Amanda Callahan
text: Too bad there is not a negative number I can enter. My mother had an appointment at 1:30pm it’s now 4:05 pm still waiting on Dr. This is beyond ridiculous.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Callahan. We sincerely apologize for keeping your mother waiting and would like to talk with you more about your visit. Please call (256) 533-1600 and ask for the Practice Administrator.

name: Brice Johnston
text:
In regards to doctors/appointments:

This is my second visit and I have averaged well over 3 hours wait time with my actual doctor visit averaging less than 5 minutes. At this point it is almost laughable. I just don’t see any way they can justify this.

Despite the incredibly long waits, the desk staff, technicians, and especially the PT staff have been exceptional. It is a shame they have to deal with these doctors hanging their patients out to dry like this.

name: Jenna Vescio
text: If I could give Dr. Banks zero stars I would. I waited for an hour and he spent less than 5 minutes with me. He had his mind made up about me before he came in the room and he barely let me speak. He clearly has an agenda for who he wants to treat and I didn’t fit the bill. Before he left he told me just keep doing what you are doing, even though I clearly told him it wasn’t working. Thank god I saw another Dr. who is actually treating me like a person, and helping me heal.  I would never ever recommend Dr. Banks to anyone.

name: jeraca M
text: If anyone is looking to get help this is not the place to go! The doctor and nurse will completely confuse you and tell you on one visit that they see things wrong on your mri then on the next visit after having a myleogram they tell you that nothing is wrong and that you are fine!

resp.text: Hello, Jeraca. We are so sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience with us. We would love to talk with you so we can personally address your concerns. Please call (256) 533-1600 and ask for the Practice Administrator.

name: tammy maples
text:
The best of the BEST.
Dr. Banks - changed my life when I met this man!!  Back and sciatic nerve pain "ruled and ruined" my life for several months.  He fixed me, he educated me and helped me to decide the plan of action.
He also has a wonderful team of people working for him 😊 Lisa is my favorite 😊
Dr. Newell - completely different breed of cat from Dr Banks but he knows his stuff!!  He's a physiatrist.   (I've never even heard of this profession before!!)  He's the guy helping me deal with this aging arthritic back, joint pain through injections, medication, exercises.
They get 5 stars.  They are Rock Stars!

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review and your thoughtful comments!!!

name: Vivian Wainscott
text: My husband had an appointment to discuss an MRI that showed a problem. The appointment was at 11:00, we was on time, an hour and 45 minutes later we're still sitting here. There are no chairs, you can't go in the office, they will not bring chairs out for their patients, even though it is spine and neuro. They have called in 2 paitent with the same doctor in front of him. The bill was paid as soon as we got here so they have their money whether we stay or not

resp.text: Hello, Mrs. Wainscott. We apologize for your wait to see the physician. A manager from our office will be in contact with you about your concerns.

name: Patricia Mabe
text: Are you going to be open tomorrow 2-15-2021 with this weather coming in tonight.....

name: Joe Atchley
text: My fiance Angie was in a bad car accident and broke her back she doesn't remember the accident, Thank God,she woke up in the hospital after the surgery and Dr. Banks and his physician assistant were there and reassured her everything is ok that was a little over 2 weeks ago and she is doing GREAT she still has pain which is understandable considering what she went through but they saved her life and ability to walk

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Atchley. Seeing comments like yours reminds us why we come to work every day at Huntsville Hospital Spine & Neuro Center! We're so pleased to hear that your fiancee came through the surgery OK and is continuing to improve. We will share your very kind words with Dr. Banks and his physician assistant.

name: Ann Gates
text: Dr Campbell is very professional and at the same time very warm and caring. She takes time o adequately explain things to the patient and help with understanding.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Gates. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful experience.  We appreciate your kind words and great review. We will share your comments with Dr. Campbell.

name: Alyssa H
text:
I came here due to neck pain.  On the first visit the nurse practitioner looked at my x-rays and told me I had straightening of the natural curve of my neck.  He didn’t really explain what that meant or what it was caused by.

I spent the next 2 weeks researching neck straightening and waiting for my MRI results.  I meet with Dr Tao and after sitting in the waiting room for 2 hours I finally get a chance to get some answers.  I was very confused when Dr Tao tells me I have a perfect MRI scan and no issues.  When I ask about what the NP told me and noted in my exam history he tells me that it’s wrong and my xrays were fine!

THEN to add to the confusion..two weeks later on the patient portal I read where Dr Tao made a diagnosis of degenerative disc!  I am very confused by all this and still have no answers to why my neck hurts like it does.  I never got to see any of my xrays or MRI results which would have been helpful but I don’t guess it even matters since I got  told so many different things and really given no solution.

And I almost forgot to add...the lady who called to set up my MRI left a voicemail and apparently thought she had hung up when she hadn’t.  I got to hear her complaining about patients on the long voicemail she left.

The only reason I give 2 stars is because the front  desk lady was very courteous and friendly.

resp.text:
Hello Alyssa,
We sincerely apologize for you unfavorable experience. We would welcome the opportunity to speak with you and try to address your concerns. Please call (256) 533-1600 and ask for Administration or Marketing. Thank you.

name: Sheila
text:
Update: I had another opportunity to visit. The process was much better but still delayed - another 3hrs. Still didn't get to see the doctor. I think this is my last visit. The staff yet remains friendly and professional. A much better experience. 2/23/19.
Not exactly sure what or how to feel after arriving for a 10am appointment and not being seen for almost 1hr 40min. The delay I understand, was caused due to discrepancy in insurance verification. The staff did not verify before I came in. This process causes delay and disappointment. Also, my MRI record from ER had not been reviewed prior; so in attempt to open, the doctor could not read or make definite diagnosis/plan - a total waist of time. It was suggested I start with an epidural in my neck - that's not why I was there. On the upside, the front office staff was nice, looked professional and the facility was clean and comfortable. It could be I'm just used to care received from UW, CHI, Swedish groups. I'm just not used to tardiness and nonchalance.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Fore-Williams. We're very sorry to hear that your visit didn't go as expected. We have made the practice administrator aware of your concerns, and she would be happy to speak with you. Please call her at your convenience. The number is (256) 533-8088. Thank you.

name: Valerie Jones
text: This was my first time seeing a Dr here. The wait was not bad so that one positive. I have had back problems for almost 30 years and I have decided to try to get better. Primary Dr sent me for an MRI and then decided to refer me here. Took the disk I picked up from North Alabama Medical Center and was told by Dr. Cho that it wasn't done right so he couldn't see the images. He told me that he would try to get them to send it right and when he could look at it he would call me. He said he would probably send me somewhere else for shots. Didn't explain anything about my report. I thought they did all of the treatments there. Why would he send me to someone else? And why would shots be the only option mentioned? But I guess since he's a surgeon and I don't need and won't have surgery I don't matter to him. He was very abrupt and didn't seem to be concerned about me. I wasted my time driving 2 hours to have nothing accomplished. His nurse and PA were great so that's another positive. But the positives don't outweigh the negatives.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Jones. We're sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience and would welcome the opportunity to work with you to address your concerns. Please call our practice administrator at your earliest convenience. Her number is (256) 533-8088. Thank you.

name: Kalee Sullivan
text: Doctor Banks and his whole staff are simply amazing. I have never met a more caring surgeon. We are so thankful for all the help from him and his staff! Lisa is the primary nurse we have dealt with and she has done so much to keep us comfortable and calm. Thank you Dr Banks and Lisa for everything!!!!

name: Renee Richardson
text: My experience with the Physicians and Staff at the Spine & Neuro Center are nothing more than  positive.  I received the most caring and prompt service/care all throughout my treatment and recovery.  I had to recognize the individual personalities and bed-side manners of my physicians and staff and listen as a patient - this helped me to not only listen but to actively participate in my treatment and recovery.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Richardson. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful experience with our team! Thank you for taking the time to share your story and feedback with us.

name: Cricket Williams
text: I had an appointment on 08/06/2019.  I had no problem with the doctor, however his nurse practitioner was very rude, and had no bed side manners at all.  I was very intimidated by this lady.  She acted as though I was faking my condition, and also made me upset.  She did spend a while in the room with me...I will give her that credit, but her bedside manners while in the room was not shown with compassion and care...she actually made me cry while she was in the room with me. Dr Murray was great the 5 min he was in the room with me, but his nurse practitioner treated me as though she was putting me through a military boot camp...Carmilita Kelly needs an attitude adjustment and learn to have better bed side manners. I know she is not my best friend...but she needs to treat pts with better care and a better attitude.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience, Ms. Williams. Your feedback is important to us, and we have shared your comments with our practice administrator. If you would like to speak with someone about your visit, please call the Patient Advocate at (256) 265-9449.

name: Diane Hess
text: I have never met a nicer, more friendly, congenial or more helpful staff. They have gone beyond and back to help me and I cannot say enough about them. I met Dr. Banks under very stressful circumstances for me & from the moment I met him, he put me at ease & answered all of my questions.  I have moved from Alabama since my first visit but this staff continues to help me more than I could ever imagine. I can never thank you all enough for everything you do!

name: Marla Y
text: I went in with extreme anxiety and fearful over my condition.  Everyone I came in contact with was so nice and helpful.  Dr Banks took time with me and my sister, explaining my problem and the procedure he wanted me to have.  He and his staff are empathetic and caring.  I left there with a hopeful feeling.  Thank you Dr Banks and staff.

name: Kiki Margarita
text: If you are looking for someone who will treat you with compassion and empathy. DO NOT see Dr. Banks he was so rude and dismissive towards me and I will never waste my time or money on seeing him. He was the rudest jerk and the person who happened to take me to the appointment was also a physician whom I am very close friends with. Needless to say she no longer refers anyone to Banks. She was horrified with his attitude towards me and I don’t know him and he had no reason to be that way.

resp.text: Thank you for making us aware of your feelings. We have shared your message with Dr. Banks and our practice administrator.

name: Sherry Wray
text: Dr Banks operated on my husband after he broke his neck in a motorcycle accident.  I found him to be very professional and kind he done everything he could to make our journey to Sheppard's center happen.  If it wasn't for Dr Banks I don't know if my husband would have ever been able to walk again.

name: Melissa Miller
text: While scheduling my appointment, the receptionist told me that it wouldn't take more than a week after my initial doctor's appointment for an epidural injection to be scheduled.  I have a herniated disc.  Extremely painful.  I can't even walk!  I can't walk.   It is debilitating.  I schedule my appointment for 7am.  Dr. Campbell doesn't even see me until 8:30.  Her nurse tells me that the earliest injection she can schedule is January 3.  Just told me I will have to do the best I can til then, because they are closing the office for a few weeks at Christmas.  So I'm suppose to suffer at the holidays.  Very disappointing,  especially since they came highly recommended.  Had the receptionist been honest, I wouldn't have wasted my time.   Now,  I've gotta find a place that can help me

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Miller. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Our practice administrator would be happy to speak with you about your concerns. Please call her at your earliest convenience. The number is (256) 533-8088.

name: Poppa York
text: The doctors and staff have always treated me with the utmost care. I really can't believe some of the snowflake comments. Someone complaining about the TVs in the waiting room. Really? These ratings are  used by people to select a doctor. Some of you people are so spoiled. The care that I received was exceptional. Would I like to have more chit chat time? Probably, but my primary concern was that they help me with my pain. Doctor Tao performed my ACDF and everything went great. Doctor Campbell performed the injections in my lower back. The quality of work was phenomenal. The staff was very friendly. The only issue I have with doctors is that they wouldn't provide me with documentation for the VA, but that has nothing to do with the work they did.

resp.text: Hello, and thank you for taking the time to share your insights about our practice. We're happy to hear that you have been pleased with your care and will make sure that Dr. Tao and Dr. Campbell see these comments. Our practice administrator may be able to help with your documentation request. She can be reached at (256) 533-8088.

name: Terry Jones
text: A year ago I was losing the ability to walk or stand due to spinal stenosis. I spent 10 years going to chiropractors.  At 60 years old I knew i was facing surgery.  Doctors told me my condition was severe. i went to another doctor before I learned of Dr. Derrick Cho. I asked Dr. Cho  an important question, can you help me? without hesitation and with much confidence, he replied yes. I knew my prayers had led me to the correct surgeon.  I highly recommend Dr. Cho his staff and Huntsville Hospital to anyone who finds themselves in need of back surgery.  i have been truly blessed by his knowledge and the work he does.

resp.text: Wow! We appreciate you sharing your amazing story with others. We're so pleased to know that Dr. Cho gave you the hope and the help that you needed. We will make sure he sees your review and knows what a difference he made in your life.

name: Sandy Bentley
text: My Mother who has a lot of medical issues, had spine surgery last Sept 2017, after recover she had no pain.  Dr. Cho was the surgeon.  He did an excellent Job and Meredith his nurse is amazing.  Little over a year later she is having additional back problems, but no fault of theirs, just part of aging and other medical issues.  I recommend Dr. Cho.

resp.text: Hello, Sandy. Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions. We will make sure Dr. Cho and his team see your very nice comments.

name: Charlotte Mulvihill
text: I've had therapy and surgery of the L3/4 spine. I think the experience was a success because I'm much better than I was when I started. I do still have pain but not anywhere near like it was before surgery. I have my left leg working well. I'm now having therapy on my neck. There's no pinched nerve in my neck just terrible tightness. I am due for an evaluation with Dr Newell. Dr Murray, my back surgeon, referred me to Dr Newell after a MRI of my neck. Dr Murray has my complete confidence and his staff is just as wonderful from the receptionist to the nurses.

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review and your thoughtful comments, Ms. Mulvihill. We're so glad that you are feeling better and will make sure that Dr. Murray and his team see your comments.

name: kevin parrish
text: I had to bring my mother to see a doctor here and I can't understand why this place would spend money on TVs, pay for the power to operate them and the cable or satellite if we don't know what is being said on them. I understand not turning the sound on but they could use closed captioning. I ask a lady at the desk but she said they were not allowed to mess with them. DON'T EVEN HAVE THEM IT'S A WAST OF MONEY!

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Parrish,

Thank you for the review.  We were unaware that the Closed Caption was no longer showing.  We will get it back up asap.  Thank you!!

name: Heather Conigliaro
text: They will send someone who has had 3 spinal neck fusion surgeries to pain management without performing proper testing such as an MRI or Millogram!!

name: Geneva Cole
text: Dr Banks is the best surgeon I’ve ever known. He’s performed 2 major  Neuro surgeries on me and they were the best they could have been. Thanks, Dr. Banks, for all you’ve done for me. I’ll never forget it.

name: J C
text: They take their time or overbook. Except Dr. Tao he is great and efficient.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Mr. Cody. We're pleased to hear your impressions of Dr. Tao and will make sure he sees this review. We will share your other comments with our practice administrator.

name: barry reaves
text:
After an MRI I had a ruptured disc pressing on my sciatic nerve , the last month have been unable to walk , stand, or lay down without excruciating pain. They were able to make me an appointment with Dr Picket's nurse practitioner Tamika Hays on 6/30, even though everyone's work schedule was overwhelming she was able to work me in for an MRI and schedule me an appointment with Dr Picket two days later. During my appointment he accessed my problems and said he needed to work me in for surgery that afternoon. We went straight to admitting. The entire staff in every department was awesome , caring and so helpful. Dr Picket finished rounds came to the hospital and I was in the OR at 4:00 pm. I woke up in recovery completely pain free and was taken care of by the best recovery team I've ever dealt with. Two hours later I was released to go home , again this morning no pain pills and completely pain free. What a first class faculty everyone went above and beyond to take care of my needs. Dr Picket and his staff was and is an answered prayer. No way I can thank him for his services , his skills , and his dedication.

Barry Reaves

name: Annette Thompson
text:
I can't say enough GREAT things about them of Physicians.  If they were not here I won't be alive today. I won't be walking.
Only negative is the wait time for Dr. Pickett but he is worth it. He is the best and caring about his patient s.  Thank you.😊

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us to care for you.  We really appreciate the kind words.

name: Jonathan Piper
text: Appointment was at 2:45  they closed at 3:30 here it is 4:35 and still in the waiting room along with five other people they said he is running behind on seeing his patients his name is Dr Murray an they wonder why you get irritated I'm not the one who is seeing the Dr an my blood pressure is through the roof right now I'm about to blow a gasket and it's 15 minutes to five

resp.text:
Hello John,
We're sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience and would welcome the opportunity to speak with you to address your concerns.  Please call (256) 533-1600 and ask for Administration or Marketing . Thank you.

name: Kasey Chamblee
text: I never had to wait long so I guess I got lucky there. July 7th I had a car accident and was sent to Dr. Cho. He has no bed side manner and acts like he is inconvenienced when we ask a question. There has been so much to happen I don't even want to type it all. He even tried to argue with me about when my accident was. He tried to dismiss me way before I was ready without therapy or anything. I had to ask if I could try physical therapy. And no they don't even look at all those records you fill out. I won't go into the MRI accident. I think if I had have had surgery I would be better now but NO he is sending me to the pain clinic. BUT his nurse is very kind I don't know how she puts up with him. Everyone else has also been nice.

resp.text:
Mrs. Chamblee,
Your opinion is very important to us.  We apologize that you had a less that satisfactory experience at Spine & Neuro.  If you would like to discuss this further, please give our office a call and ask for the Marketing Department. Discussing the details of your experience may not only clear up any misunderstandings in relation to your situation, but may also help improve the experience of our future patient's.  Thank you.

name: Tommy Townsend
text: I was living in Tuscaloosa before a brain hemorrhage. I woke up days later in Huntsville Hospital Neuro ICU. If not for the surgical skill of Doctor Jason banks as well as the dedication of doezens of staff members, I most certainly would be dead at age 25. I think that deserves a 5 star review.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Mr. Townsend. Taking call for the North Alabama area is something that we take a lot of pride in.  We are glad that we could be of service to you.

name: DeAnne Emerson
text: Dr. Banks told my husband he should begin drinking to aleave his pain.  He was hateful and unresponsive to my husband's pain!  His license should be removed!  He's a hateful hak!

name: L T
text: I had an appointment with Dr. Banks CRNP, Jason, first so I could get an MRI before seeing Dr. Banks. I only had to wait 30 minutes. He listened to my concerns and was empathetic. I told him I did not want to take pain meds so he offered me other options to make me more comfortable. He was very knowledgeable and answered my questions. I was hesitant about seeing a CRNP instead of the Dr. but I am glad I did. Hope my appointment with Dr. goes as well.

name: Mama Gee
text: The spine and Nero came highly recommended yet when I tried to get an appointment it was next to impossible. The person in charge of making these appointments was extememly difficult to deal with & after a while it became apparent that clearly they don't need patients or else they would treat those who want and need appointments with respect & a helpful attitude. I will be going elsewhere.

resp.text: I am sorry that you had a bad experience.  Please call our office and ask to speak with our marketing representative if you would like to discuss further.

name: Emily Graham
text: My husband was airlifted and brought to HH for a traumatic brain injury and open skull fracture. Dr. Zywicke can be credited with saving his life. She performed emergency brain surgery within minutes of him landing at the hospital and if it had not been for her quick actions, I’m afraid of what the outcome would have been. She was absolutely amazing and her bedside manner was excellent. She updated me every morning in the neuro ICU and then again after we got to the floor. I cannot say enough wonderful words about her as a physician and surgeon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, and for sharing your story!

name: Karen George
text: Was and am very pleased with staff and Dr. Tao. Pray it all works and can be pain-free. Many thanks to all of you.

resp.text: Thank you Karen.  We hope that you can get back into the swing of things.

name: Steve Thunder
text:
Dr. Banks saved my life from N. Bacterial Meningitis, within hours if my death and/or living as a vegetable forever. Dr. Banks had just finished an emergency brain surgery on an automobile accident victim that was helow'd in at 10pm the doctor, our hero, began cutting opened spinal cord at my Lumbar all the way up to my neck-decompressing & fussing my spine while scrapping the infection out, them although he had a brain surgery scheduled at 7:30AM, he continued working to scrape the deadly infected pus out if my neck & brain for hours while he was exhausted-I had 6 different doctors/Specialists, but Dr. Banks & Dr. Leyroy Harris (an infectious  disease specialist) were the two docs that prevented me from entering  death's door, I owe my life to them!

Steven Schwartz
SUA SPONTE! From me
Bow-WOW!!! From Thunder, my
Greaf and Mighty WWSERVICEDOG!

name: Stacey Gass
text: I love my Dr which is Dr Murray and he has been my dr for years! He has helped me with pain! And also helped find out back in 2014 along side some other Drs that I had cancer! I love this man this place and I recommend it to everyone who needs anything done to you spine or your neck!!

resp.text: Thank you Stacey!  We appreciate your feedback.

name: Chris Skinner
text:
Worse experience with Doctor’s Office in my life; been two months of hell. Wife was hit head on by a drunk driver April 4th 2015. After being released from the hospital we went to see our family doctor. Our family doctor referred us to the Spine & Neuro Center due to her numerous injuries, back and neck pain. After your 1st appointment with the doctor, they recommend you do their in house physical therapy.  Don’t do your therapy there! Trust me go get your therapy done elsewhere. Michael the physical therapist will evaluate you then pass you off to one of his two aids to do the future therapy appointments. After fourteen physical therapy appointments the pain only is getting worst. So we went back to see our family doctor the 2nd of June. He wanted us to see the doctor again at the Spine & Neuro Center. GOOD LUCK GETTING IN AGAIN. Their appointments are six weeks out. Appointments receptionist gives you excuse we can only see new patients in sooner.  ---- That sounds like discrimination to me! ---- Very disappointed with the Doctor never following up with us after repeat calls talking to the nurse about pain and physical therapy.  Obviously the Doctor has no clue what is going on in the day to day routine in their office.

Finally, they refused to transfer our physical therapy from their in house program to a different company in Huntsville.

name: Linda Schrader
text: Compassionate and caring.  Dr. Banks is a great doctor as is he staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the compliment and for trusting us to take care of you!

name: Tanya Penley
text: wonderful staff and Dr Gaspard is great so thankful for everything he has done to help my daughter

name: My Stinkers
text:
Nov 23rd, 2013
Dr. Rhett Murray has no ethics. He doesn't follow the (doctor's medical oath of ethics) to help and treat his patients. Dr. Rhett Murray does not address his patient's questions, concerns, or pain. When asked questions he does not answer the asked questions or inform patient of their diagnoses. He is horribly rude. Dr. Rhett Murray does surgery and then he discharges his patients after their second follow up; without notifying the patient. Dr. Rhett Murray does not help or address patients that are having complications, severe pain, or in need of his medical knowledge. Dr. Rhett Murray's RNs are also rude on the phone. Dr. Rhett Murray has no concern other than making money from surgery. He is known in the medical community of dumping his patients that are having complications and pain on the patient's primary physician. He does not address or help his patients when they are the most vulnerable and of need of his medical help.

name: Jon Bierer
text: The office lied to me about my appointment time, they told me 7:30 am and so I arrived at 7 am to fill out paperwork, Then another patient for Dr. Zywicke went ahead of me at 7:30 and I was told my appt was at 8 am. No one told me I'd have to pay for parking in the parking garage, they gave me 10 pages of questions only to ask me all the same questions once I got in the room. Did you even look at it? I raised my concerns to multiple nurses only to have them tell me they're sorry, but they never said they would look into it or fix it. Dr. Zywicke just told me i needed physical therapy. She didn't provide a diagnosis until I asked, didn't give me a recovery time until I asked. She didn't schedule a follow up visit even though multiple Physical Therapists have asked me when my follow up is because they expected a follow up with the doctor. I went to urgent care and a chiropractor before coming here thinking they would take care of me. I asked for an MRI and Dr. Zywicke refused. I'd rather drive to Nashville than deal with this clinic again.

resp.text: I apologize for the issues that you experienced during your appointment at Spine & Neuro.  Please understand that Spine & Neuro appreciates all reviews and considers all comments, complaints, and suggestions.  Unfortunately, because the review is posted anonymously, investigating the incident properly to resolve the matter is a bit more difficult.   If you would like to discuss this incident further, please call our office and ask for the marketing department.  If not, please consider setting up an appointment with one of the other 5 neurosurgeons in our office.  I assure you that the outcome of your appointment will differ.  Thank you.

name: Brandy Bright
text: I was sent for back surgery and apparently they don't pay ur mri any attention just their xray which of course only shows bones..now I have to go for back injections which is only gonna cover up my pain. I also can't figure out how to get to the patient portal. Every time go they are rude even called me a liar cause the nurse didn't answer to tell them I was gonna be late, so the doctor left and they resheduled my appt. Called me a liar about calling. This is a 2 hr drive 4 me They are so rude. I can't believe the unprofessional behavior in this office

resp.text: Hi Brandy, I'm sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.   I am unable to find you in our records system.  Perhaps you are listed under a different name.   If you would like to discuss this matter, please call our office and ask for the marketing department.

name: Justin “GrumpyGamer” Herring
text: Stay away from this place if you can help it! Just make the drive to Birmingham or Nashville where you can find experienced doctors who actually want to help you. I saw Dr. Cho here twice, he's also the new guy they have to write his name in on the appointment cards. The first time I saw him was to evaluate my neck pain and get a diagnosis, then a treatment plan. On the first day they send you to physical therapy, this is just a given with any surgeon exhausting the possibility of anything working before surgery. Then you will also be set up with a pain doctor in their office, which will take you a week to see the first time then a month or two the next time. I expressed that I had no interest in being on pain medication and taking shots to come to find out was not the answer, nor the prescribed treatment for my condition, the only used option was surgery which he will not do because i'm not the most perfect patient for surgery. The condition i have is forminal spinal stenosis and it is advanced to the point over the years that it, as it almost always does, has exacerbated old injuries to my lower back and put me in a ton of pain. Dr. Cho doesn't care if you have a loss of feeling in you limbs, or you are in sever pain, I mean he doesn't even go over your MRI with you in the office, he puts it in his very formal text book response he creates and sends to your pain doctor. If you do any shots don't expect him to evaluate the area because he won't, nor will he do any physical examination to further understand your condition. The most he will do is set there and tell you what he thinks without discussing anything with you and you are supposed to live with it. I had a second and third opinion after my first initial visit, and both out of respect for their profession asked that i return for the second visit with Dr. Cho before I came back to them, because they were sure that he would do the surgery at least on my neck, so I could heal and work on becoming this perfect patient so he could or they could fix my lower back. The second opinion I had wasn't by my choice, it came when I was hospitalized for loss of my bladder and bowl control at my primary physicians office which is concerning especially when I also was having a hard time walking or standing. The third opinion I had locally just to confirm his and the ER surgeons diagnosis. So when i went back i again expressed my extreme disinterest in being drugged up or shot up every week, because two opinions and multiple medical studies i had read by this time all say the same thing. The only thing that fixes my problem with (in any patient) a near 100% rate of success is surgery. You can imagine my surprise when he went totally in the opposite direction. In short i'm scheduled for my surgery next week in Birmingham after seeing one of the surgeons at the neurosurgery center there, who actually had some reservations as to doing it early but consulted with another physician in the room with me (nice to not be left in the dark) and told me the recovery may take a week or two longer but they can fix the issue. Again, In Short save yourself the time of seeing someone who only cares about the money and how long they can keep you taking shot's, pills, and collecting from you and your insurance company. Not to mention i couldn't be released to my job until i was fully medically cleared, and taking pills and shots doesn't get you cleared for normal duty at your job. I've learned to go with my instincts lately with doctors, some you can tell first off if they are genuinely interested in helping you or are just there to collect as much money as possible. (this was my first instinct with Cho, yet i ignored it) and the rest is history, just hope others heed my advice on this guy. REALLY WANT TO GIVE THEM NO STARS, BUT IT WON'T LET YOU!

resp.text: I apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations.  Please call our office and ask to speak with our marketing representative if you would like to discuss further.

name: Gary Rice
text: I am very happy with the whole experience of Mr banks and staff

name: Sarah Maynor
text:
I love this place. I was rear ended Sept 18th 2015, Dr Tao, found out where the source of my pain was coming from and fixed it ONE BY ONE. First, I had a C 6-7 herniation, I had cervical surgery on that level Dec 1st 2015, didn't have to go to therapy or wear a neck brace. He used Glue to close my incision, no stitches, gauze or bleeding afterwards. Totally took away all of my neck issues.

I lived in pain with sciatic and back pain in the si joint region for 8 months. He could have done back surgery and it would've failed, because, it wasn't in the upper spine, but in the si joint above my tailbone. He explained this to me, sent me for injections in the si joint, the injections relieved the pain for awhile. By doing this, he knew, this was the area that was damaged.

I had been reading about the Triangular implants designed specifically to stabilize and fuse the heavily loaded SI joint.  which is called I FUSE. We discussed this procedure, and June 21st 2016 I had it done. It's now 7/7/2016 and I have no pain in my back or tailbone area or legs. The day of surgery, I was laying there before my surgery and thought I would cry from the back pain, when I woke up it was gone.

I was on crutches less than 14 days after the surgery, It's fusing, and I am so glad I found Dr Tao and the Neuro Center in Huntsville Alabama. I would trust this group of Doctors, especially Dr Tao with my life. If you've had failed back surgeries, in pain, please go see him today. I'm glad I did. I am totally drug free! Didn't take any pain Killers after my surgery. Some bruising pain will happen for about 3 days, nothing like the pain I had before my surgery.
Don't be afraid of the I-fuse surgery, at the moment I am walking around on both feet and can't even tell I had surgery June 21st 2015

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your care. We are so happy that you have had a positive experience, and we thank you for sharing your experience with us.

name: sherry dianne Burke
text: Receptionist could not find mri in computer which had been sent. Actually rescheduled &left. 2 hr drive. Someone else found them &called me back. No treatment except offer recurring visits for "pain management" & rx for brace which was imposs to wear sitting, or laying down, or eating

name: Chuck Uhrich
text: I have 2 numb fingers and had neck surgery to repair it.  The problem is no better and has been 2 years.

name: erik chalmers
text: Eccellent doctors and nurses. The office staff isn't getting an appointment is the most gruelling and tedious process.

name: Bill Brownell
text: Plan on spending half your day waiting.  Dr. Wasn't even there when our scheduled appointment was. He was on call.

resp.text: Your time is valuable to us, and we apologize if we made you feel the opposite.  Yes, our group does take trauma call for the North Alabama region, so there are times when emergencies come up that have to be taken care of.  However, we do our best to avoid scheduling conflicts whenever possible.  We encourage our schedulers to inform patients about any possible scheduling conflicts that may occur when scheduling appointments.  We also encourage our front desk personnel to keep our patients informed when emergencies arise on the day of their appointment.  Again, we apologize if you were not made aware of your physician's call status.

name: Madison Haven Apts
text: Wonderful place Dr. Cho is awesome!!! He fixed me right up!!

resp.text: Thank you!! We love Dr. Cho too!  We appreciate you choosing us to care for you.

name: Nanci Greene
text: Excellence

resp.text: Hello,  Ms. Greene. Thank you for the five-star rating! We're glad that you are pleased with our services.

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review

text: HORRIBLE! Dr. Zywicke is the most unprofessional doctor I have ever seen! Tried to downplay my pain in my back and make it seem like it was no big deal!!!! SUCKS!!!

resp.text: We apologize that your experience at Spine & Neuro was less than satisfactory.  Thank you for posting the review.  Feedback, whether positive or negative is used improve service to our patients.  If you would like to discuss further, please call our office and ask for the marketing department.  Thank you!!

name: Karen Prete
text: Ridiculous that you have to wait over 2 1/2 hours just to see a doctor. Early morning appointment (7:45) meant nothing. Still waiting 2 1/2 hours later (10:25).
